info.name: WorkFlowyGiffmexSerif
info.description: Double-space between bullets, blue hyperlinks, gold bullet halos, unobtrustive tag colors, and uses the stunning Google Font "Merriweather", downloadable from https://www.google.com/fonts#UsePlace:use/Collection:Merriweather
info.additionalInfo: Requires having the Google font "Merriweather" installed.
